definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Provides the defined community the regarding system and the landscape system.
sentences.chinese: 提供明晰的社區導視系統和景觀體系。

sentences.english: Yet the true significance is far from clear.
sentences.chinese: 這一工作的真正意義目前遠未明晰。

sentences.english: It insists upon one’s performing an act of lucidity as one performs an act of faith.
sentences.chinese: 它堅持要求人們行事明晰透徹，如同執着於信仰。

sentences.english: The photograph showed a distinct image.
sentences.chinese: 照片顯出了明晰的影像。

sentences.english: Novelty in Simplicity and Conciseness--the language features of Zhu Ziqing s "Songtangyouji";
sentences.chinese: 簡潔的語言和明晰的風格是他寫作的特點。
第二，明晰戰略，調整結構。

sentences.english: If aught I have said is truth, that truth shall reveal itself in a clearer voice.
sentences.chinese: 若我所訴本就是真理，它將更明晰地揭示自己。

sentences.english: Predictions on the impact of bar- gaining power on outcomes are not clear cut.
sentences.chinese: 針對討價還價實力對談判結果影響的預測尚不明晰。

sentences.english: First, the research category of freeze-thaw is discussed and its definition is crystallized.
sentences.chinese: 首先探討並明晰了凍融侵蝕的定義與研究範疇。

sentences.english: It has main timber distribution base with clear responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 並且擁有自己的主材配送基地，責任明晰。

sentences.english: Spirit Speaks - Expansive description of out of body experiences and lucid dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 講精神膨脹描述出體經驗和明晰的夢想。

sentences.english: Powers and responsibilities of such a harmonious teacher-student relationship is not only clear but also very fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 這類和諧師生關係不僅權責明晰，而且其樂融融。

sentences.english: The new fossils shed light on debates about tyrannosaur evolution.
sentences.chinese: 這一新化石的發現使有關暴龍進化的爭論逐漸明晰。

sentences.english: The key of modern enterprise system is property right perspicuity.
sentences.chinese: 建立現代企業制度的核心是產權明晰。

sentences.english: The reasoning is classic in its clarity.
The notes in the book are precise and distinct.
sentences.chinese: 書中對於題畫詩的註釋，可謂簡要而明晰。

definition: to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
